summary:
Ever wanted to experience the true Sith Lightning power in Skyrim?
This is for you!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to see what is to unleash the Sith Force Lightning in Skyrim?
You are a Star Wars fan and you like the Dark Force?
Then ...may the Dark Side be with you!
You have come to the right place, my apprentice!....
                                      
[center]------------THE-ULTIMATE-FORCE-LIGHTNING-MOD-FOR-SKYRIM--------------[/center]                                                   [center]  999----MAY THE DARK SIDE BE WITH YOU----666

[youtube]KRAWhEnaMNE[/youtube][/center].........................................................................................................................................................................................

This mod is a compilation of the best "Force Lightning" related mods for skyrim.
I made it so it is the most realistic of all and to bring a real "Sith Lord" experience to Skyrim.

[quote]It is quite a powerful one, it chains toward targets and it stuns them causing them to fall on the ground when hit. [/quote][center]"Unleash the true power of the Force Lightning."[/center]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Install the mod files from the "TESV" folder to your "The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data" folder.
Check the "Ultimate Force Lighting" in your Skyrim Launcher "DATA FILES".

NOTE: It is Strongly advised that you have the Downguard and Dragonborn DLC Installed. Just to prevent any corruption of the Dark Force!

For location of the spell tome checkout this video here:

[youtube]GsdvNo6fkzk[/youtube]

Want my other mods ?

Checkout my "Ultimate Shapeshifter Mod" here:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58376
author: Mortenort
